name: SurpriseSurprise
0:
”Alexa, Surprise Surprise!”
”Alexa Open Surprise Surprise!”
”Alexa, Launch Surprise Surprise!”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: surprise surprise
des:
Imagination is key for creativity and let's unbox a mystery toy and try make it more fun by getting into action by playing Surprise Surprise. 

Surprise Surprise! helps making choices, sparks imagination, improves listening skills and encourages pretend play as well as get as some movements by using only your voice and listening, without any visual aids. 

It's so simple to see what's inside the mystery box just by Voice!! Remember, Get ready to move or do pretend play and have fun with some of our all-time favorite imaginary toys!

Intentionally created with no Visuals for enhancing listening skills rather than tap one mystery box! More you listen, More you respond, More fun it would be!

Just give it a try by,

# "Enable the Skill, "Surprise Surprise" in your Alexa Devices.
# Just Say... "Alexa, Open Surprise Surprise!"

That's it! You are all Done! Now you can make your choices and open your imaginary toy box just by saying! 


Kindly leave your ratings and reviews and feedback, which would be helpful in shaping "Surprise Surprise!" 
Would love to hear which imaginary toys/pretend plays you loved and what else you wish to add on! 
You could also share with your friends and family!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
